divs: sighting detailsi was driving south on 71 hwy and looked to the east at which time i saw an orange \ pinkish beam come down from the sky. it was skinny at the top and widened as it got to the ground. i watched it for about two seconds and it was gone. no craft was seen.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Belton
There were no other sightings in Belton on or around July 9th 2013
Summary: I was driving and saw a beam come down from the sky.
